original_text: For we also have had the good news proclaimed to us, just as they did; but the message they heard was of no value to them, because they did not share the faith of those who obeyed.
korean_text: 그들과 같이 우리도 복음 전함을 받은 자이나 들은 바 그 말씀이 그들에게 유익하지 못한 것은 듣는 자가 믿음과 결부시키지 아니함이라

sentences.original_text: For we also have had good news proclaimed to us
was of no value to them
because they did not share the faith
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 믿음을 공유하지 않았기 때문입니다
